name: osu-tools
description: osu parser for db/osr files and some stuff

scripts.clean_build_run: rd built /S /Q && npx tsc && node --max-old-space-size=8000 built/index.js && pause
scripts.test_osu_db: npx tsc && set NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" && ts-node tests/test_osu_db.ts
scripts.test_scan_songs: npx tsc && set NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" && ts-node tests/test_scan_songs.ts

author: ChervyachokMigo
